resources.string: You aren\'t traceable via your AdId
You are traceable via your AdId
SCOPE_DEVELOPER means appSetId is scoped to the developer of the app and cannot identify a single user.
SCOPE_APP means appSetId is scoped to the app and can identify a single user.
AppSetIdManager is unavailable and cannot be used for identification

MeasurementManager is used for ad performance tracking, registerSource function is used to let the OS know something useful happened (viewing an ad, clicking on a button). registerTrigger is to let the OS know something actually happened (user installed app, clicked on link, etc.). Functions registerWebSource and registerWebTrigger are used for web contexts.
